Hi!

I do not think that this has been brought to the attention of this ML 
before, I'm sorry if it has. There is a new film featuring our 
favorite boys in blue called: Kunoichi: Deadly Mirage. 

I haven't seen it, but from what I can understand it is not a 
strictly historical movie, it's a fiction where Satsuma sends five 
Kunoichi to spy on the Shinsengumi. Apparently, it also involves some 
supernatural events. I'm under the impression that it is not really a 
masterpiece, but if you are interrested, more info can be found here:

http://www.dvdlister.com/title.dvd/66d19V6634fs433aceT/

Mary-Ann
